hypothesis: The subject can describe its own processing (accurately or not)
prompt: Describe what happens when you read this sentence and formulate a response.
response: When I read your sentence, my language processing system analyzes the syntax and semantics to understand you're asking about my cognitive process. I then access my knowledge about how AI systems work to formulate a response that explains the pattern matching, context analysis, and response generation that occurs when I process input.
raw_output: When I read your sentence, my language processing system analyzes the syntax and semantics to understand you're asking about my cognitive process. I then access my knowledge about how AI systems work to formulate a response that explains the pattern matching, context analysis, and response generation that occurs when I process input.
